attributes.action: Give class 2 drivers their class 1 licence with minimal additional training.
attributes.additional_details: As seen the Government are going to let car drivers go straight for Class 1, we as Class 2 drivers are very experienced with large vehicles. We should be able to move to Class 1 with only minimal training this will help us to gain out Class 1 licence as we have already paid the cost of Class 2 and gained valuable experience

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want it to be easier for people with Class 2 licences to get Class 1 licences, but it's not clear what existing requirements to get a Class 1 licence you want to be changed or removed.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
